metadata.dc:author: Alcoba Leza, M
de Castro Losa, M R
Blázquez Encinar, J
Jorquera Plaza, F
metadata.dc:description: Two cases of tenosynovitis tuberculosa are presented. It was the only tuberculosis manifestation in one of them. The other showed a normal chest X-ray but epithelioid granulomas were found in the bone marrow examination which forced a differential diagnosis to be made of multiple myeloma. The combined therapy, surgery + drug regimen for tuberculosis produced a good evolution.
metadata.dc:title: Tenosinovitis tuberculosa. A propósito de dos observaciones.
[Tuberculous tenosynovitis. Apropos 2 cases].
